title: How can I make images not zoom with OS zoom setting?
content:
I have a Firefox 136 on Ubuntu 20.04.

Recently I've discovered that images on websites I view through Firefox are scaled with OS zoom setting (which is set to 125%) even when the browser zoom is 100%.

View -> Zoom -> Zoom Text Only setting does not help with this.

How can I make images in web pages I view through Firefox to display exactly at their size, without any kind of zoom irrespective of any OS zoom setting?
creator: beloborodov.i.b

title: Adding or changing my email.
content: I want to change my email address to a mozmail address. Nothing in the program will permit any change. How do we change or add an email address?
creator: michael_setser

title: Firefox stopped loading
content:
Good evening (or morning, depending on your time of day)

As of about 3 days ago, in the middle of browsing, Firefox stopped loading any and all pages I tried to go to. There are occasional times where, if Firefox initially opens from a link, it will start to load the page, but then stop partway and, although it claims to be loading, will make zero progress and eventually time out. Since then, I have done a Firefox refresh, full uninstall and reinstall of the program, defragmented and done a virus scan of my computer to no results and still have had no luck fixing the issue. I've tried opening the troubleshoot mode, but any attempts to do so have been met in error, as Firefox closes to reopen, but never reopens and instead gives a crash report that it states can't be sent. In fact, that crash report that can't be sent shows up for every time Firefox closes, making the app not even open until I clear that report. I've attached pictures of the browser console that I've not had any luck assessing, the problem loading page that is not showing the same timeout error it had previously, and the crash report that it states cannot be sent.

If anyone has any solutions, that would be wonderful and I'd be extremely grateful. Thank you very much in advance.
creator: Dementisxyz

title: Truist Bank connection
content:
I get the following error when trying to connect to my bank. It worked fine yesterday and didn't perform any updates or make any browser changes. If I go into troubleshoot mode, I don't encounter this issue. I have no issues on a different computer. How do i fix this?

Thanks

title: Copy-paste not working in Yahoo Mail
content: Firefox is my default browser and I use Yahoo Mail. In the past, while writing an email, I would copy text from MS Word file (ctrl+C) and paste it (ctrl+V) in Yahoo Mail. These commands do not work anymore. Need a solution.
